titleStmt.title: In this booke is conteyned the names of ye baylifs custos mairs and sherefs of the cite of londo[n] from the tyme of king richard the furst ...
Chronicle
titleStmt.author: Arnold, Richard, d. 1521?

notesStmt.note: Includes the first printing of "The nut-brown maid".
Title from opening words of text.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank (LC catalogue card).
Signatures: A⁴ ² A B⁴ C-E F-Q⁶ R S-V⁶.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
